page.title: 10TRAFFIC IN SITTINGBOURNE
page.content: The council recently built a new roundabout on the A2 East of town.We questioned 21 people at the round- about,and most of them thought it was dangerous,and wanted to start again.Everyone said there were more traffic jams at rush-hours.Quite a lot of people disliked the new one-way system in East Street because only buses can go both ways,emergency vehicles have to take a longer route, and shops had lost trade.The pedestrian crossings are also in dangerous positions.The council are planning changes in the near future.We did a mid-morning traffic survey to count vehicles turning from the roundabout into South Avenue.In 1 hour 25 minutes there were 462 cars,62 vans,25 lorries,23 bikes, 18 motor- bikes,6 buses,and 14 other vehicles. {Total 610. 4.8 vehicles a minute.
